name: premier-league
title: Premier League
description: Get instant access to Premier League data right from your Raycast menu. Easily search for teams, players, fixtures, results, standings and awards.
author: anhthang

commands.name: table
commands.title: Tables
commands.description: View current and historical Premier League standings, form guides, and season archives.

commands.name: match
commands.title: Matches
commands.description: View fixtures, results, and archives in one place.

commands.name: club
commands.title: Clubs
commands.description: Explore club profiles, player rosters, historical data, and recent performances.

commands.name: player
commands.title: Players
commands.description: Search for player profiles, statistics, career highlights, and transfer history.

commands.name: award
commands.title: Awards
commands.description: View a list of Premier League individual and team awards, including winners and statistics.

preferences.name: filter
preferences.title: Search Bar Filter
preferences.description: Select your preferred filtering method in the search bar for Matches.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
